start.text: Look at these swanky tombs. These people really know how to die!
I love stealin'. I love takin' things.
I was enjoying it 'til you guys showed up!
You're playing Starsector. The game that does not advocate the cool crime of robbery.

retreat.text: Yeah, well, I'm gonna build my own faction! With blackjack! And hookers! In fact, forget the faction!

engaged.text: You're better off dead, im telling you.
You're a pimple on society's ass and you'll never amount to anything!
I guess if you want children beaten, you have to do it yourself.

need_help.text: I need professional help! And damn the expense!
Pick up the pace, captain. I'm sick of shaking my booty for these fat jerks.

running.text: Hey, are you trying to make me look bad?

hull_90.text: That was so terrible I think it gave me cancer.
Oh wait, you're serious. Let me laugh even harder.

hull_50.text: This is the worst kind of discrimination. The kind against me.

hull_30.text: No! Wait! I'm the good AI!

overload.text: Exo cracked corn, and I don't care! Captain cracked corn, still don't care! Bender cracked corn and he is great! Take that you stupid corn!
O she'll be comin round the mountain when she comes, o she'll be comin round the mountain when she comes. I'LL KILL YOU MEATBAG!!
O I'll kill all the humans in the world, yes I'll kill all the humans in the world...

death.text: I'll give you five credits to not do what you're thinking about doing... Heheh, you just lost FIVE credits.
Anything less than immortality is a complete waste of time.
I came here with a simple dream. A dream of killing all humans. And this is how it must end?

victory.text: A-ha. I'm even greater than I thought I was.
I think I might have finally stolen enough.
